{{also|wiedersehen}} ==German== ===Etymology=== {{compound|de|wieder|t1=again|sehen|t2=to see}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈviːdɐˌzeː(ə)n/}} * {{audio|de|De-Wiedersehen.ogg|Audio}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|n|Wiedersehens|Wiedersehen}} # [[reunion]]; [[see]]ing [[again]]; instance of seeing someone or each other again ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-n|s}} ===Interjection=== {{head|de|interjection}} # {{alternative form of|de|auf Wiedersehen}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
